page.title: 04Media
page.content: In Cribyn we have a{local newspaper called{Llais Aeron}which serves Cribyn,Temple Bar,Ciliau Aeron and Felin-Fach.It lists marriages and things that happen in the area.It is sold in the Post Office.The Cambrian News is sold in the Post Office.It is a paper for the county.It has events and a childrens page and stories that have happened.We have the Cambrian Trader an advertisment paper.The National papers are the Sun,Daily Mail,Daily Mirror and the Western Mail.We have magazines like Horse and Hound,T.V Times,Radio Times and sunday magazine.On T.V there are 4 stations.I like nature,news and comedy programmes. people hire tapes of films and cartoons for their videos. I also like listening to the radio on stations 2 and 4.
